last_episode_to_air.name: Part 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: Decades after the murders, a local sheriff uses new technologies to examine old evidence in order to help uncover the truth behind long unsolved questions.

name: Keeper of the Ashes: The Oklahoma Girl Scout Murders
original_name: Keeper of the Ashes: The Oklahoma Girl Scout Murders
overview: The true story of three young Oklahoma girls, found murdered after their first night at sleep-away camp. The tragedy, as well as the manhunt and trial of their suspected killer, captivated the nation in the summer of 1977. But decades later, uncertainties surrounding the case continue to haunt the Tulsa community, local law enforcement, and the victims' families.

episodes.name: Part 1
episodes.overview: Award-winning actress and singer Kristin Chenoweth returns to her home state of Oklahoma to investigate the infamous killing of three young girl scouts, found murdered after their first night at sleepaway camp.

episodes.name: Part 2
episodes.overview: In the wake of the brutal murders at Camp Scott, the hunt for the victims’ killer escalates.

episodes.name: Part 3
episodes.overview: A trial begins to convict the alleged killer. But do prosecutors actually have a case — or is the man on trial just a convenient scapegoat?

episodes.name: Part 4
episodes.overview: Decades after the murders, a local sheriff uses new technologies to examine old evidence in order to help uncover the truth behind long unsolved questions.
